2022 New Holland Canadian Under-21 Curling ChampionshipHome » 2022 New Holland Canadian Under-21 Curling Championship
2022 New Holland Canadian Under-21 Curling Championships
2022 New Holland Canadian Under-21 Curling Championships are taking place in beautiful Stratford, ON March 25 – April 1, 2022. The Stratford Country Club is co-hosting this event with the City of Stratford and together this will be our third National Championship we have hosted in the previous six years. The Stratford Rotary Complex will be transformed into two, four sheet curling rinks for seven days of exciting curling. The week will showcase the talents of 18 men’s and 18 women’s curling teams from across Canada.
Official Draw
Click Here to Download Schedule
Ticket Information
Tickets for the U-21 Canadian Curling Championship full week pass are currently on sale! To purchase a full week Pass ticket Click Here
Day passes are $25.00 per day and are officially on sale. Click Here to purchase yours today.
Draw Tickets are $10.00 per draw Sunday – Thursday . Tickets for final day (Friday April 1, 2022) are $15.00 per draw. To purchase draw tickets click here
Opening Weekend Special
Closing Celebration will be hosted at the Stratford Country Club on Friday April 1, 2022. We will have limited tickets available for this event. All players receive complimentary tickets to this event. Tickets will go on sale on Monday March 14, 2022, to purchase tickets please visit our online store.
Volunteer Information
If you are interested in volunteering for this event. Please send an email to info@stratfordcountryclub.ca. We look forward to hearing from you.
Sponsorship

53 Romeo Street North
Stratford, ON N5A 6S2 (519) 271-4212

title: Canadian Junior Cup: Home
text:
Home | Canadian Junior Cup
top of pageHomeAuctionScoresLivestreamAboutCanadian Junior CupRunback U18 ChampionshipSwitzerland 20232023 EventHost Hotel InformationEvent ScheduleSwitzerland 2024Competition GuidelinesCode of ConductContact Us2023 AUCTION is live!Building Global Connections and a Passion for Curling:
Welcome to the WFG Canadian Junior Cup!The only event sending you to Switzerland!Welcome to the WFG Canadian Junior Cup, where we build global connections and a passion for curling. As the premier junior curling event, teams from across the globe come together to compete in this exciting championship.
​
This year, we're thrilled to host the 2023 edition from December 28th to December 30th, 2023 at the Oshawa Curling Club in Oshawa, ON. The competition will be intense, and the talent on display will be truly remarkable.
​
But the WFG Canadian Junior Cup is more than just a competition. We're dedicated to grassroots initiatives that help build the next generation of curlers. We believe in the power of this sport to bring people together and create lifelong connections.
​
The highest placing Canadian team will have the opportunity to attend the prestigious Swiss Cup in Bern, Switzerland from February 19th to February 26th, 2024, and we can't wait to see who that team will be.
​
Join us at the WFG Canadian Junior Cup and experience the thrill of top-level competition, the joy of grassroots initiatives, and the power of curling to connect people from around the world.Swiss ExchangeGet ready for the trip of a lifetime! The Swiss Exchange is an exciting opportunity for the highest ranking Canadian teams to compete in the prestigious Swiss Cup in Switzerland in 2024.Mixed Doubles ExperienceIn addition to top-level competition, we're also offering a unique social aspect through the Mixed Doubles Exhibition. This event pairs you up with your fellow competitors for a chance to win prizes and make new friends.Long lasting memoriesParticipating in the event is an incredible way to create long lasting memories that you will cherish for years to come. The excitement, camaraderie and sheer joy of the game make it an unforgettable experience for all involved.bottom of page
